subdisciplines.name: Science Journalism
subdisciplines.description: The reporting of scientific news and information to the public, including popular science stories and news articles covering scientific discoveries and breakthroughs.

subdisciplines.name: Science Communication
subdisciplines.description: The practice of communicating scientific information to different audiences, including journalists, policymakers, and the general public.

subdisciplines.name: Technical Writing
subdisciplines.description: The production of technical documents, such as research reports, user manuals, and instructional materials, for a variety of audiences, including scientists, engineers, and industry professionals.
